metadata.query_body: Dear insta money team I register insta money app by mistake please deactivate my account

fields.email_body: Dear team insta money loan why my loan rejected
fields.imrejected:
Dear [Customer's Name],

Thank you for reaching out.

We regret to inform you that your loan application was reviewed by our Lending Partner and did not meet the required eligibility criteria. The possible reason for the rejection has been sent to your registered email address and can also be viewed in your application dashboard.

Please note that the registration fee is non-refundable, as it covers the cost of credit assessment and verification, which are completed during the application process.

We recommend reviewing the reason provided and addressing any issues before reapplying. You are welcome to submit a new application after 30 days.

If you have any questions or need further clarification, feel free to contact us.
fields.subject: Loan rejacted
